meanings.definition: A person who possesses charisma or charm.
meanings.sent1: The charismatics in the room captivated everyone with their charm.
meanings.sent2: The charismatics at the party were the center of attention.
meanings.sent3: The charismatics made even the grumpiest person smile.
meanings.sent4: Her presence was like a magnet, drawing people to her like charismatics.
meanings.sent5: The charismatics had a way of lighting up the room with their charm.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who are known for their charismatic qualities.
meanings.sent1: The charismatics in the club were always the life of the party.
meanings.sent2: The charismatics in the office were great at motivating others.
meanings.sent3: The charismatics decided to start a band to spread their charm through music.
meanings.sent4: The team worked like a well-oiled machine, thanks to their charismatics.
meanings.sent5: The charismatics were like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
